ygData.subject: Re: Charisma and Dexterity
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve seen a 50 Necro with a 49 pet and a 50 cleric backing him up manage to handle the frenzied spawn, after a very weak starting spawn so they could get the
ygData.messageBody:
I've seen a 50 Necro with a 49 pet and a 50 cleric backing him up manage
to handle the frenzied spawn, after a very weak starting spawn so they
could get the split, but this combination....it must have been quite a
show. I'll fall into the very surprised catagory with Shada. :)

Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana

> would be VERY surprised and impressed if a 50 druid, 44 necro, and 37 bard
> can do the frenzies.
>
> Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Mithaniel Marr Server
